{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
template&lt; class Duration &gt;
static std::chrono::utc_time&lt;std::common_type_t&lt;Duration, std::chrono::seconds&gt;&gt;
    from_sys( const std::chrono::sys_time&lt;Duration&gt;&amp; t );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Converts a {{tt|sys_time}} {{c|t}} to a {{tt|utc_time}} {{tt|u}} that represents the same point in time.

{{c|u.time_since_epoch() - t.time_since_epoch()}} is equal to the number of leap seconds that was inserted between {{c|t}} and 1 January 1970. If {{c|t}} is the exact date of a leap second insertion, that leap second is counted as inserted.

===Return value===
A {{tt|utc_time}} representing the same point in time as {{c|t}}.
